text: The 2018 PDC Players Championship 2 was the second of twenty-two Players Championship events on the 2018 PDC Pro Tour. The tournament took place in Barnsley, England on 18 February 2018. It featured a field of 128 players and £75,000 in prize money, with £10,000 going to the winner. It was won by Michael van Gerwen. ==Seeds== == Prize money == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Stage !!
